query: Q35. Which choice is an include guard for the header file mylib.h?
options:
```c
#ifdef MYLIB_H
#undef MYLIB_H

// mylib.h content

#endif /* MYLIB_H */
```



```c
#ifndef MYLIB_H
#define MYLIB_H

// mylib.h content

#endif /* MYLIB_H */
```



```c
#define MYLIB_H
#include "mylib.h"

#undef MYLIB_H
```



```c
#ifdef MYLIB_H
#define MYLIB_H

// mylib.h content

#endif /* MYLIB_H */
```
